data.title: the80sand90s.com on LinkedIn: Galaxis (1995) — The 80s and 90s
data.meta_description: The latest from our film review series, "The 80s and 90s Overlooked", Milo and Jamie look at “Galaxis” (also know as Terminal Force) from 1995 starring…
data.text:
Summer is here, and before you know it, winter will be as well. So, with this episode of the podcast, the guy's list four movies for your summer vacation, followed up with four winter movies for your winter vacation. You can listen to the whole episode now or listen to the first half now and save the second half for your winter vacation. Either way, you will find out about some great films worth watching. Some you have heard of and some you might not have. https://lnkd.in/gnbidmcj

In this episode of "The 80s and 90s Uncensored" the guys lament the loss of Roger Corman, the undisputed king of B-movies. From cult classics to the stars he launched, this episode is a nostalgic tribute to the man who turned low budgets into cinematic gold. https://lnkd.in/gx9W7daW

The Fall Guy, created by Glen A. Larson, ran for 5 seasons from 1981 to 1986. The show starred Lee Majors as Hollywood stuntman Colt Seavers, who worked on the side as a bounty hunter. In this episode of “The 80s and 90s Uncensored” Milo and Jamie look back at this classic action comedy to discuss the making of the show, share trivia, and their memories of who they wanted to when they grew up. https://lnkd.in/gxF6XdHG

Ghostbusters, directed by Ivan Reitman, was released 40 years ago. The movie follows a team of parapsychologists who discover the existence of ghosts and offer their expertise to bust them. This 1980s classic has spanned sequels, reboots, cartoons, and entertained generations. In this episode of the podcast, Jamie and Milo discuss some interesting facts about the movie and why they still love the movie. https://lnkd.in/gK4UzEgY

May 18, 1980, and Mount St. Helens, blew it’s to raining ash across multiple states. The eruption claimed lives, wiped out forests, and reshaped the landscape forever. In this episode of “The 80s and 90s Uncensored” the guys revisit the eruption that brought in the 1980s with a bang. And they share some of their personal memories of the event. https://lnkd.in/g2YEXpbZ
